edu.ncsu.csc216.flight.plane

Class GateAgent

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.ncsu.csc216.flight.plane.GateAgent

  • public class GateAgent
extends java.lang.Object
    Class creates a gate agent that interacts with the rest of the methods. Gate agent is what the GUI uses to interact with the backend functions of assigning seats.
    Author:
    Andrew Northrup

    • Method Detail

      • removePassenger

        public void removePassenger(int passenger)
        Removes a passenger from the manifest and the flight
        Parameters:
        passenger - number for the GUI to use

      • addPassenger

        public void addPassenger(int reservtype,
                         java.lang.String passengername,
                         boolean seatpref)
        This method adds a passenger to the manifest and attempts to find a seat for this reservation. If name is null or all whitespace it throws illegal argument exception. When invoked it creates a new FlightReservation
        Parameters:
        reservtype - type of reservation 0=first class, 1= bus class, 2=econ class
        passengername - passenger's name
        seatpref - passenger's seat preference where true is prefers window, false is prefers aisle

      • getSeatMap

        public java.lang.String[][] getSeatMap()
        Gets a seat map of seats with names
        Returns:
        array of seat names

      • getSeatOccupationMap

        public boolean[][] getSeatOccupationMap()
        Gets a seat map of seats and their occupied status
        Returns:
        array of seat status

      • printReservations

        public java.lang.String printReservations()
        Gets a seat map of seats and their occupied status and prints as string
        Returns:
        string of reservation report
